condition.string: Switch to default pathfinding when I don't have a lastCheckpoint yet
Am I going to red shop?
Am I going to red drill (bacK)?
Am I going to red launchpad?

Am I going to the back of the top of red lane?

Am I going to the center healthpack in the top lane?
Am I going to the center of the upper lane?
Am I going to the center of the bottom lane?
